mobiheader.fullname: The Thirteenth Step: Addiction in the Age of Brain Science

exthheader.author: Heilig, Markus
exthheader.description: A leading physician scientist explains why, despite major advances in our understanding of addiction, treatment continues to be ineffective--even harmful--and how we can achieve better outcomes.
exthheader.subject: Psychology/Psychopathology/Addiction
exthheader.updatedtitle: The Thirteenth Step: Addiction in the Age of Brain Science
